translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Book of Conditional Relations

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)🔽17.33. Sanidassanattika, Ajjhattārammaṇattika🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naajjhattārammaṇo🔽dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nabahiddhārammaṇo🔽dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca🔽nasanidassanasappaṭigho nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya  ajjhatta ārammaṇa ttika  anidassana appaṭigham ajjhatta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ  dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe avigate cha  anidassana appaṭigham bahiddhā ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ  dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham bahiddha ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca  na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na bahiddha ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā a nidassana appaṭigha
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations with the Triad-Couplet Numerical Compendium

original: bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo
analyzed: bahiddhā ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigham bahiddha ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho nabahiddhārammaṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nabahiddhārammaṇo🔽ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ ca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ  ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe aññamaññe
translated: … with non-perceptible and impinging and with non-perceptible and non-impinging conditions.🔽(The rest is abridged.)

With respect to cause there are six; with respect to predominance there are six; … with respect to mutual dependence there are three; … with respect to non-obstruction there are six. (The section is to be elaborated as in the section on the internal and external eye element.)
